short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your Chrome tabs into a serene retreat with the cozy and vibrant Anime Living Room Live Wallpaper. 🏡✨🌸

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the charm of an anime-inspired living room to your browser! This live wallpaper creates a warm and inviting atmosphere with its intricate details: glowing lanterns, soft cushions, a beautifully arranged tea set, and a large window offering a picturesque view of a peaceful anime-style garden. Perfect for anime lovers, this design transforms your new tab into a calm haven amidst the bustling online world.

Key Features
🎨 Live Anime Aesthetic: A cozy, animated living room scene straight out of your favorite slice-of-life anime.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Integrated seamlessly into the design for easy web browsing.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Stylishly presented to match the serene theme.
🔗 Customizable Shortcuts: Add your most-used links to blend functionality with beauty.
🔗 Extension Management Links: Access "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" options from the bottom-left corner.
Indulge in the tranquil vibes of the Anime Living Room Live Wallpaper and make every tab a delightful escape to your favorite anime world!
